message_history.content:
Answer the given question. You must conduct reasoning inside <think> and </think> first every time you get new information. After reasoning, if you find you lack some knowledge, you can call a search engine by <search> query </search> and it will return the top searched results between <information> and </information>. You can search as many times as your want. If you find no further external knowledge needed, you can directly provide the answer inside <answer> and </answer>, without detailed illustrations. For example, <answer> Beijing </answer>. Question: List the annual global top 1-top 10 grossing games downloaded via iPhone & iPad by AppMagic from 2020-2024 (including 2024), with the official English name, the publisher, and the first official release date.

Please organize the results in one Markdown table with the following column names in order:
Year, Ranking, Game, Publisher, Release Date
Please list Release Date in the format of yyyy-mm-dd
Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the columns without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is ```markdown
{data_content}
```?

To compile the data for the annual global top 1-to-10 grossing games downloaded via iPhone & iPad by AppMagic from 2020 to 2024, I need to identify the games, their publishers, and their initial release dates. Unfortunately, the exact details like ranking, release dates, and publisher names aren't readily available through simple searches. 

<search>annual global top 1-to-10 grossing games downloaded via iPhone & iPad by AppMagic from 2020-2024</search>

Search query: annual global top 1-to-10 grossing games downloaded via iPhone & iPad by AppMagic from 2020-2024
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.statista.com/statistics/697688/leading-iphone-mobile-games-global-downloads/?srsltid=AfmBOop4-qm_avF1TM-qPljgWChhnNPlLRLbH-7inNPHEWbRu0Emq7ej):
Global top iPhone games by downloads 2024 - Statista Leading iPhone gaming apps in the Apple App Store worldwide in February 2025, by downloads (in millions) ; Roblox, 3.49 ; PUBG MOBILE, 3.38.

[Doc 2](https://appmagic.rocks/top-charts/apps):
Top Apps - AppMagic Top Grossing. Top Featured. Downloads. Top ... How Devolver's Ball x Pit Bounced to $10M on Steam · Top 10 Hybridcasual Games in Q3 2025: Rollic Claims 4 Spots.

Top Grossing Games (2026) - Business of Apps Top Grossing Games on Apple App Store 2024 ; Roblox, 823 ; Dungeon Fighter: Origins, 796 ; Monopoly Go, 759 ; Candy Crush Saga, 674.

Based on these sources:

Search query: first official release date of Roblox
Result: [Doc 1](https://roblox.fandom.com/wiki/History_of_Roblox):
History of Roblox - Roblox Wiki - Fandom Roblox came out of beta and was officially launched on September 1, 2006. Early history. The original currency, ...

[Doc 2](https://www.reddit.com/r/roblox/comments/4qv1gn/rohow_roblox_history_and_clearing_up_confusion/):
roHow? - Roblox History and clearing up confusion - Reddit 1996 was when things started to kick off. ROBLOX had officially began and it looked promising. Two years later in 1998 an early test texture was ...

[Doc 3](https://noping.com/blog/when-was-roblox-created):
When Was Roblox Created? The Origins of the Platform - NoPing Although Roblox's development and internal prototypes began years earlier, the public launch of Roblox is dated to September 1, 2006. On that ...

Let’s assemble the data:

<search>publisher of Roblox</search>

Search query: publisher of Roblox
Result: [Doc 1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roblox):
Roblox - Wikipedia Developer · Roblox Corporation ; Publisher, Roblox Corporation ; Designers · David Baszucki Erik Cassel ; Platforms · Windows · macOS · iOS · Android · Xbox One ...

Roblox Corporation - Wikipedia an American video game developer based in San Mateo, California. Founded in 2004 by David Baszucki and Erik Cassel, the company is the developer of Roblox.

[Doc 3](https://en.help.roblox.com/hc/en-us/articles/203313370-Roblox-Company-Information):
Roblox Company Information Roblox was founded in 2004. The founders were David Baszucki and Erik Cassel. The main headquarters are located in San Mateo, California.
